original_text: He will not accept any money or bribe to pay the debt, even if it is a lot of money. He will not accept any money or bribe to pay the debt, even if it is a lot of money. He will not accept any money or bribe to pay the debt, even if it is a lot of money.
korean_text: 어떤 보상도 받지 아니하며 많은 선물을 줄지라도 듣지 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: He will not accept any money
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 어떤 돈도 받지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: or bribe to pay the debt
even if it is a lot of money
